Statements.Text: What places have you lived (for more than 3 months) during your lifetime?
What cultural identity(ities) have most shaped your upbringing?
What was your family make-up growing up?
What activities were you heavily involved in as a child? How did you spend your time?
What is your family make-up as an adult?
What are your favorite hobbies as an adult?
What have been the most impactful jobs you have held?
Who were the most impactful people in your life?
What were the most impactful experiences in your life?
When did you become a believer in Jesus?
What purposes or causes do you feel most drawn to?  What cause makes your heart break or race?  Where could you make the greatest impact for God?
What places do you feel most called to?  This could be industry, neighborhood, or city.
What are the top two needs you love to meet for people? What are the areas of need that cause your heart to break or race when you encounter that need in someone else?
What would you do for God if you knew you couldn't fail?  What pushes you to action?  What moves you so deeply it keeps you awake at night?
